long_description: A lightweight running shirt for tough training runs, the Salomon Start Grip T-Shirt for men helps you reach your next fitness goal in comfort. Silicone print on shoulders helps keep a running hydration pack in place during long trail runs (hydration pack not included). Polyester fabric speeds moisture to the surface for quick evaporation, and mesh fabric panels encourage cooling airflow. Fabric helps protect skin from UV light with a UPF rating of 40. Stash pockets at side hems store small items such as energy gels or your media player. Reflective highlights increase visibility in low light. Smooth, flatlock seams reduce chafing. Salomon Start Grip T-Shirt for men features a relaxed fit.
short_description: A lightweight running shirt for tough training runs, the Salomon Start Grip T-Shirt for men helps you reach your next fitness goal in comfort.
